result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael P Bender was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 2nd Degree Sexual Assault of Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
STAYED.
If revoked, Defendant IS NOT eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program or Substance Abuse Program.

miscConds.notes: BAIL APPLIED. Court Costs and DNA PAID IN FULL.

Maintain absolute sobriety.
Follow through with any treatment/counseling recommended.
No contact with the victim and no unsupervised contact with any minors under the age of 18 years old, unless approved by Agent.
Provide DNA sample if not already provided.
Must register with the Sexual Offender Registry.
Undergo the Sex Offender Treatment program.
Not to use or possess any device that can access the internet unless approved by the Agent.

timeConds.notes: Condition Time - First 6 months STRAIGHT TIME, next 3 months with HUBER and last 3 months STAYED, to be used at Agent's discretion as well as to the huber or straight time. Court grants 59 days credit.

records.addlTxt: Order for Condition Time
Request to use Conditional Jail Time
Copy of photo

Defendant Michael P Bender in court with attorney Katie B. Bricco.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case called for sentencing hearing. Defendant's mother and girlfriend presents statements to the court.   Court imposed the following sentence:

  The Defendant was sentenced to the following:

IMPOSED AND STAYED SENTENCE OF:    

6 YEARS IMPRISONMENT 
  -  3 YEAR(S) OF INITIAL CONFINEMENT
  -  3 YEAR(S) OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION;

TERM OF PROBATION:  5 YEAR(S);

CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:  
 
*Absolute Sobriety
*Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
*No contact with:  the victim and no unsupervised contact with any minors under 18 years old unless approved by the agent
*DNA sample to be provided if not yet previously done.
*Must register with the Sexual Offender Registry
*Undergo the Sex Offender treatment program
*Not to use or possess any device that can access the internet unless approved by the agent
 
COURT COSTS:  $268.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation);

DNA SURCHARGE:  $250.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation);

CONDITION TIME: 1 year (1st 6 months are straight time, next 3 months with huber and the last 3 months, STAYED; to be used at agent's discretion.  Agent to determine with or without non working hours). Defendant given 59 days credit.  

IF REVOKED:
Defendant is not eligible for Challenge Incarceration Program.
Defendant is not eligible for Substance Abuse Program.

Felony warnings, voting rights and firearms warnings given.
Sentencing hearing at 01-29-2016 10:00 am
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Michael P Bender in court with attorney Katie B. Bricco.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant enters a no contest plea as to count 1. Count 2 is dismissed and read-in. Attorney Bricco is requesting a sentencing hearing on another date. Court grants and court further orders that a Pre-sentence investigation be done and the report be done within 45 days. Court does revoke bail, but does allow huber bailee status.
